ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( ShipmentService__c = "SP-FI", ShipmentService__c = "SP-FN", ShipmentService__c = "SP-PT" )&& ISPICKVAL( Shipment_Status_Plann__c,"Confirmed" ) && Country_of_Discharge__c = "Mexico" && Country_of_Load__c = "Mexico" && ISBLANK(Vehicle__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: ERROR: Must be Choose OPERATOR, VEHICULE AND CARRIER (Debes de capturar el Proveedor, Vehiculo y Conductor)
